  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105856</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205423</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kids on Stage: Marsh Youth Theater</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zicklein auf Stadium: Sumpf-Jugend-Theater</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gosses sur l'étape : Théâtre de la 
Jeunesse de Marais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Miúdos no estágio: Teatro Da Juventude Do 
Pântano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capretti sulla fase: Teatro Della Gioventù 
Della Palude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατσίκια στη σκηνή: Θέατρο νεολαίας έλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cabritos en etapa: Teatro De la Juventud Del
Pantano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK goes backstage as 40 5th-9th grade students in the Marsh Youth Theatre (MYT) Mainstage Performance Ensemble prepare for the premiere of Jip, His Story. This Educator Guide is about the history of children's theatre in the US.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN geht Bühne hinter dem Vorhang, während 40 5.-. 
Gradkursteilnehmer im Sumpf-Jugend-Theater (MYT) Mainstage Leistung 
Ensemble für die Premiere von Jip sich vorbereiten, seine Geschichte.
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die Geschichte des Theaters 
der Kinder in den US.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE va à l'arrière plan pendant que les
40 5ème-9èmes étudiants de catégorie dans l'ensemble d'exécution 
de Mainstage du théâtre de la jeunesse de marais (MYT) se préparent
à la première de Jip, son histoire. Ce guide d'éducateur est 
au sujet de l'histoire du théâtre des enfants aux USA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA vai backstage enquanto 40 ö-øs 
estudantes da classe no ensemble do desempenho de Mainstage do theatre
da juventude do pântano (MYT) se preparam para a premier de Jip, sua 
história. Esta guia do educador é sobre o history do theatre 
das crianças nos E. U..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA va backstage mentre 40 quinto-noni 
allievi del grado nell'insieme di prestazioni di Mainstage del teatro 
della gioventù della palude (MYT) si preparano per il prima di
Jip, la sua storia. Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la 
storia del teatro dei bambini negli Stati Uniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ πηγαίνει παρασκήνια όπως 40 5$ος-9οι 
σπουδαστές βαθμού στο σύνολο απόδοσης Mainstage θεάτρων 
νεολαίας έλους (MYT) προετοιμάζονται για το πρεμιέρα 
Jip, η ιστορία του. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι 
για την ιστορία του θεάτρου των παιδιών στις ΗΠΑ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA va entre bastidores como 40 5to-øs 
estudiantes del grado en el conjunto del funcionamiento de Mainstage 
del teatro de la juventud del pantano (MYT) se preparan para la 
premier de Jip, su historia. Esta guía del educador está sobre
la historia del teatro de los niños en los E.E.U.U..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205423</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105856</entry>

  </manifestation>
